Leah Vukmir: s position on Buy American legislation was criticized by Democratic Sen. Tammy Baldwin's campaign spokesman, who accused Vukmir of siding with powerful special interests and multinational corporations instead of supporting Wisconsin workers and businesses.
A mailer attacking Vukmir: s stance on Buy American legislation referenced a newspaper article from July 5, 2018, in the Fond du Lac Reporter, which quoted Vukmir as saying Baldwin's proposed policy is not sustainable and would drive up infrastructure costs for Wisconsin taxpayers.
Vukmir: s team did not provide further information on her position when asked, instead referring back to the statement quoted in the Fond du Lac Reporter article.
During a debate at the University of Wis: Milwaukee, Baldwin highlighted her support for Buy American legislation, while Vukmir was not asked about the measure and did not comment on it.
